abstract: Norfolk Southern rejects Canadian Pacific's third acquisition offer of over $30 billion.
lead_paragraph: Norfolk Southern said, “It would be inconsistent with the duties of the board to pursue a risky and uncertain offer that substantially undervalues the company.”

headline.main: Norfolk Southern Rejects Canadian Pacific’s Third Offer
headline.print_headline: 3rd Overture for Railroad to Sell Itself Is Spurned

snippet: Norfolk Southern said, “It would be inconsistent with the duties of the board to pursue a risky and uncertain offer that substantially undervalues the company.”
